ChangeList.Description: Changed the **type** parameter in the [createLink](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/driveItem-createLink?view=graph-rest-beta) method from optional to required.
Changed the **type** parameter in the [createLink](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/listItem-createLink?view=graph-rest-beta) method from optional to required.
